summary: Fully workable Skeleton Key after Thieves Guild quest completion.
descriptionHtml:
Author:
    Squall
    
Description:
    This mod makes the Skeleton Key usable after it has been given back to Nocturnal.
    You'll will get it after Thieves Guild mission. If you've done the quest then take it from the chest in Twilight Sepulcher.
    The Skeleton Key is unbreakable, dropable, sellable and doesn't require lock pick.
    
Installation:
    Always make a backups to Saved game and replacing files!
    Copy Data folder to your game DIR and enable "Skeleton Key.esp".
    
Uninstallation:
    Delete "Skeleton Key.esp" from Data folder.
    Delete "SkeletonKeyAddRemovePerk.pex" from Data/Scripts folder.
    Delete "SkeletonKeyAddRemovePerk.psc" from Data/Scripts/Source folder.
    Use backups and replace "QF_TG09_00021555.pex" and "TG09QuestScript.pex" in Data/Scripts folder.
    Use backups and replace "QF_TG09_00021555.psc" and "TG09QuestScript.psc" in Data/Scripts/Source folder.
    
Thanks:
    Bozzz123 for letting to understand how to add/remove perks on item count!
author: Squall
